message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I'm willing to be generous, Alice, but this split is fairer considering the inflation.
Time is money, Bob. Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at our profits.
This is my final offer, Alice. Let's be pragmatic and wrap this up.
Bob, this back and forth is pointless. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
